document.full_text: early studies suggest an experimental alzheimer's drug attacks free-floating bits of a protein called beta amyloid, a sign the drug may fight what some researchers consider to be the disease's chief culprit.
document.title: alzheimer's drug hits two forms of toxic protein
lines_and_colors: early studies suggest an experimental alzheimer's drug attacks free-floating bits of a protein called beta amyloid, a sign the drug may fight what some researchers consider to be the disease's chief culprit.
